welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montreal, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and diverse culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Montreal has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Jean Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for charter and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
